changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO "orders".orders (table_number, status, active, created_at) SELECT floor(random() * 20 + 1)::int as table_number, (ARRAY['PENDING', 'SENT_TO_KITCHEN', 'READY'])[floor(random() * 3 + 1)] as status, true as active, NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' as created_at FROM generate_series(1, 10) s;
